section.title: Technology Requirements
section.p: Part of this course involves teaching you how to use a graphing calculator such as a TI-84, TI-89 or Casio Classpad. You are required to have one and bring it to class everyday.
You will also need Internet access for most of your homework. If you do not have Internet access at home, you can find it in PCC computer labs. Here is an example of what WeBWorK is like.
